attributes.action: Stop the needless destruction of Military Working Dogs.
attributes.additional_details: Please read Vidar's story. Google my name Angie McDonnell. Thank You
attributes.background: Everyday Military working dogs, heroes that have saved countless Military and civilian lives are being destroyed. Please sign my petition to help these dogs get the life they deserve! My boy would be dead today if I hadn't have pushed to rehome him. Let's push for the other heroes! Thank You
